message: Starting review of Quick Test phase - gathering handover and agent findings
Retrieved agent findings - verifying deliverables against success criteria

Review complete: Phase deliverables verified and APPROVED. CRITICAL BUG FOUND: submit_review_verdict fails with UnboundLocalError on current_idx, preventing verdict submission. The phase meets all success criteria (task created and trackable, test agent completed successfully), but the review system is broken and cannot proceed due to MCP server bug in real_mcp_server.py
